text: • The paper refers throughout to " optimization " . I think a mathematician might object to the use of the term because the method doesn ' t actually use a formal optimization process . I don ' t think this is too much of a problem but I do think a clear statement of what the authors mean by optimization would be helpful ( e . g . in the Methods ) . As I understand it , the " optimal " ventilation rate is just taken to be the one for which the health burden is smallest .
